search.query: | eventstats max(_time) as mt| convert ctime(mt) timeformat="%d/%m/%Y"

| fields - "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | eval Country=Country+","+Lat+","+Long | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 - _time | head 1 | fields - _time | transpose | rename column as "Country", "row 1" as "Confirmed" | sort 0 - Total | eval fields=split(Country,",") | eval Lat=mvindex(fields,1) | eval Long=mvindex(fields,2) | eval Country=mvindex(fields,0) | table Country | dedup Country

change.eval: case($gp$="15","Over The Last 2 Weeks", $gp$="31", "Over The Last Month",$gp$="61", "Over The Last 2 Months", $gp$="10000", "Since 1/1/2020"

search.query: | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 - _time | head 1 | fields + _time | eval date = _time | eval date=strftime(date,"%d/%m/%y") | fields date

| fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | search $country$ | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 - _time | head 1 | fields - _time | transpose | rename column as "Country", "row 1" as "Total" | sort 0 - Total | stats sum(Total) as Total

| inputlookup recovered.csv | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | search $country$ | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 - _time | head 1 | fields - _time | transpose | rename column as "Country", "row 1" as "Total" | sort 0 - Total | stats sum(Total) as Total

| inputlookup deaths.csv | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | search $country$ | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 - _time | head 1 | fields - _time | transpose | rename column as "Country", "row 1" as "Total" | sort 0 - Total | stats sum(Total) as Total

| fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | search $country$ | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 + _time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor((_time-time2)/86400) | fields days * | fields - days starttime time2 *username* | fields _time * | addtotals | fields _time Total | streamstats current=f window=2 last(Total) as last | streamstats current=f window=2 last(Total) as last | eval perc_incr=round(((Total-last)/last)*100, 2) | stats last(perc_incr) AS R

panel.title: New Cases - Size of Bubble by New Deaths Count $gpl$

search.query: | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | search $country$ | addtotals | sort 0 - Total | head 25 | fields - Total | untable Country _time count | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor(((_time+86400)-time2)/86400) | table days count Country | join Country days [| inputlookup deaths.csv | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | untable Country _time count | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor(((_time+86400)-time2)/86400) | table Country days count | rename count as death_count ] | fields Country days count death_count | sort 0 Country days | autoregress count p=1 as prev | autoregress death_count as death_prev | eval new_cases=count-prev, new_deaths=death_count-death_prev | where new_cases>0 | fields Country days new_cases new_deaths | tail $gp$ | sort 0 days
| streamstats avg(new_cases) as anc window=7 | eval "Avg New Cases"=round(anc,2) |table days "Avg New Cases" trend | tail $gp$ | sort 0 days

panel.title: infected vs Recovered vs Deaths Counts

search.query: | inputlookup confirmed.csv | fields * | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | search $country$ | addtotals | sort 0 - Total | head 25 | fields - Total | untable Country _time count | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 + _time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor((_time-time2)/86400) | fields days * | fields - days starttime time2 *username* | fields _time * | table _time count Country | join Country _time [| inputlookup recovered.csv | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | untable Country _time count | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 + _time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor(((_time+86400)-time2)/86400) | fields days * | fields - days starttime time2 *username* | fields _time * | table Country _time count | rename count as recovery_count ] | join Country _time [| inputlookup deaths.csv | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | untable Country _time count | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 + _time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor(((_time+86400)-time2)/86400) | fields days * | fields - days starttime time2 *username* | fields _time * | table Country _time count | rename count as death_count ] | eval active_cases=count-recovery_count-death_count | chart values(active_cases) as infected values(recovery_count) as recovered values(death_count) as xpired over _time

panel.title: Total Confirmed Cases With Overall Infection Rate

search.query: | fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | search $country$ | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 + _time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor((_time-time2)/86400) | fields days * | fields - days starttime time2 *username* | fields _time * | addtotals | fields _time Total | eval num=1 | streamstats sum(num) as num | eventstats max(Total) as max min(Total) as min max(num) as max_points | eval trend=max/max_points | fields - min max max_points | sort 0 + Total | streamstats sum(trend) as "Average Cases (All-Time)" | fields - trend | rename "Total" as "Total Cases" | eval "Overall Infection Rate"=round('Total Cases'/num,2) | fields - num "Average Cases (All-Time)" | eventstats max("Overall Infection Rate") as "Maximum Infection Rate" | rename "Total Cases" as "TotalCases" | streamstats current=f window=2 last(TotalCases) as last | rename TotalCases as "Total Cases" | fields - last

| fields - Lat Long "Province/State" | rename "Country/Region" as Country | stats sum(*) as * by Country | dedup Country | search $country$ | transpose 0 column_name=_time header_field=Country | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%m/%d/%y") | sort 0 + _time | eval starttime="01012020" | eval time2=strptime(starttime,"%m%d%Y") | eval days=floor((_time-time2)/86400) | fields days * | fields - days starttime time2 *username* | fields _time * | addtotals | fields _time Total | rename "Total" as "Total Cases" | rename "Total Cases" as "TotalCases" | streamstats current=f window=2 last(TotalCases) as last | eval perc_incr=round(((TotalCases-last)/last)*100, 2) | rename TotalCases as "Total Cases", perc_incr as "Daily Infection Rate" | fields - last | fields _time "Daily Infection Rate"

| inputlookup covid19-data-israel.csv | foreach * [| eval "<<FIELD>>"=replace(<<FIELD>>,",","")] | eval _time=strptime(date,"%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S %p") | sort 0 _time | autoregress total_tests as last_tests p=1 | eval tests=if(isnotnull(tests),tests,total_tests-last_tests) | fillnull value=0 | fields - total_cases total_tests last_tests xpired date pct_positive_tests | bin span=1d _time | chart values(*) as * by _time
